lrc.lyric:
[by:LeeKoo]
[00:23.24]Waiting at the station.
[00:29.52]Waiting for the right moves.
[00:36.01]Waiting in the basement.
[00:42.09]Waiting for the right cues.
[00:48.18]Waiting in a daydream.
[00:54.47]Waiting in this slipstream.
[01:01.56]Waiting...
[01:06.84]Waiting in the right bars.
[01:13.12]Waiting in the right shoes.
[01:19.41]Waiting in a fast car.
[01:25.70]Waiting in the airports,
[01:31.99]Waiting for my air-miles.
[01:38.07]Waiting in slow motion,
[01:44.15]Coming through the turnstiles...
[01:52.06]And if you ever change you mind,
[01:57.54]You know I'm not hard to find.
[02:03.02]And if you ever need someone,
[02:08.49]I'll still be waiting...
[02:16.40]Waiting with the orphans.
[02:22.68]Waiting for the bee stings,
[02:28.77]They tell me that success brings.
[02:35.26]Waiting in the half-light.
[02:40.73]Waiting through your whole life.
[02:47.02]Waiting for an ideal, a low deal, a no deal.
[02:53.51]Play your stereotype, oh yeah...
[03:01.22]And if you ever find the time,
[03:07.11]You know I'm not far behind.
[03:12.57]And if you ever need someone,
[03:17.68]I'll still be waiting...
[03:24.22]Just waiting, for a friend.
[03:31.04]Waiting...
[04:07.60]I said it's alright!
[04:13.07]It's alright, my friend...
[04:19.56]Yeah it's alright!
[04:32.54]Just waiting...
